sentences.en: A racially mixed jury in Miami convicted Lozano of manslaughter, but an appellate court overturned the convictions.
sentences.cn: 在迈阿密，由多种族人士组成的陪审团裁决洛扎诺犯过失杀人罪，但上诉法庭推翻了该判决。

sentences.en: Back in Miami Beach, he could proceed with his surgery.
sentences.cn: 回到迈阿密海滩之后, 他便可以开始修整面颜.

sentences.en: But four days ago, you bought a ticket from miami to Argentina.
sentences.cn: 但是4天前, 你买了一张从迈阿密去阿根廷的机票.

sentences.en: By 1980, Miami beach had all but totally eroded.
sentences.cn: 到1980年，迈阿密海滩已经完全风蚀了。

sentences.en: Contrary to our expectation, the Miami Heat won the game.
sentences.cn: 与我们所期待的相反, 迈阿密热火队赢了这场比赛.

sentences.en: Do you have any flights to Miami?
sentences.cn: 你们有飞迈阿密的班机吗？

sentences.en: He also had interests in Miami Beach and Cuba.
sentences.cn: 他在迈阿密海滩和古巴都有分支结构.

sentences.en: He has moved back to his home town of Miami.
sentences.cn: 他已经搬回了自己的家乡迈阿密。

sentences.en: In November Ray himself escaped from Cuba and made his way to Miami.
sentences.cn: 十一月,拉伊本人逃出古巴,来到了迈阿密.

sentences.en: It's not always nice and sunny in miami , sometimes cloudy and rainy.
sentences.cn: 的气候并非总是晴空丽日, 有时也有阴天下雨的时候.

sentences.en: Lister's dead. Ditto three Miami drug dealers and a lady.
sentences.cn: 利斯特死了，还有三个迈阿密毒贩和一位女士也死了。

sentences.en: Nick from Miami, Lenny from New York, and Fay and Flame.
sentences.cn: 来自迈阿密的尼克, 纽约的兰尼,菲和富莱幕.

sentences.en: Now Miami is the plastic surgery capital, right?
sentences.cn: 迈阿密是整容手术的中心, 对 吧 ?

sentences.en: Obviously that was the end of me in Miami.
sentences.cn: 很明显，这就是我在迈阿密的结局。

sentences.en: Take Miami Beach. I've always loathed this place, you know.
sentences.cn: 就拿迈阿密海滩来说吧, 你知道, 我一直讨厌这个地方.

sentences.en: The eye of the hurricane hit Florida just south of Miami.
sentences.cn: 飓风的风眼袭击了佛罗里达州迈阿密正南部。

phrases.tran_cn: 迈阿密海滩（位于美国佛罗里达州）

trans.tran_cn: 迈阿密（美国佛罗里达州东南部港市）
